sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ${FORM}(formID, formVersionId, formType, formModel, encId, patientId, stationId, totalScore, EvaluationTime, CreateTime,createUserId,createUserName,RECORD_POID,BEDID) VALUES(#formId#, #formVersionId#, #formType#, #formModel#, #encId#, #patientId#, #stationId#, #totalScore#, #evaluationTime#, #createTime#,#createUserId#,#createUserName#,#recordPoid#,#bedId#)

INSERT INTO ${FORM}(formID, formType, formModel, encId, patientId, stationId, totalScore, EvaluationTime, CreateTime,createUserId,createUserName,RECORD_POID,formItems,formVersionId,STATES,bedId,receiveTime,receiveUserId,receiveUserName,CALM_ID,EVENTIDS,versionNo,content) VALUES(#formId#, #formType#, #formModel#, #encId#, #patientId#, #stationId#, #totalScore#, #evaluationTime#, #createTime#,#createUserId#,#createUserName#,#recordPoid#,#itemstring#,#formVersionId#,#states#,#bedId#,#receiveTime#,#receiveUserId#,#receiveUserName#,#calmId#,#eventIds#,#versionNo#,#content:VARCHAR:NULL#)

INSERT INTO ${FORM}(formID, formType, formModel, encId, patientId, stationId, totalScore, EvaluationTime, CreateTime,createUserId,createUserName,RECORD_POID,formItems,formVersionId,STATES,bedId,receiveTime,receiveUserId,receiveUserName,OFFORMID) VALUES(#formId#, #formType#, #formModel#, #encId#, #patientId#, #stationId#, #totalScore#, #evaluationTime#, #createTime#,#createUserId#,#createUserName#,#recordPoid#,#itemstring#,#formVersionId#,#states#,#bedId#,#receiveTime#,#receiveUserId#,#receiveUserName#,#ofFormId#)
sqlMap.select: select formid from ${FORM} where formType=#fromType# and OFFORMID=#ofFormId# ${WITHUR}
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ${FORMITEM}(ID, formID, itemKey, itemValue, otherValue, encId, patientId, stationId) VALUES(#ID#, #formID#, #itemKey#, #itemValue#, #otherValue#, #encId#, #patientId#, #stationId#)
sqlMap.select: select ID from ${FORMITEM} WHERE formID=#formId# and itemKey=#itemKey# ${WITHUR}
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM ${FORMITEM} WHERE formID=#formId# and itemKey=#itemKey#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT formID,formVersionId, formType, formModel, encId, patientId, stationId, totalScore, EvaluationTime, CreateTime ,createUserId,createUserName,eventIds,versionNo, states
,f.content as content
,null content
FROM ${FORM} where encId=#encId# and formType=#formType# and formModel=#formModel#
and CreateTime>=#beginDate# and CreateTime<=#endDate# and formID=#formId#
order by EvaluationTime ASC ${WITHUR}
SELECT formID, itemKey, itemValue, otherValue, encId, patientId, stationId FROM ${FORMITEM} where encId=#encId# and formId=#formId# ${WITHUR}

SELECT f.formID,f.formVersionId, f.formType, f.formModel, f.encId, f.patientId, f.stationId, f.totalScore, f.EvaluationTime, f.CreateTime ,f.createUserId,f.createUserName,f.eventIds,f.versionNo,f.states
,f.content as content,null ITEMKEY,null ITEMVALUE,null OTHERVALUE FROM ${FORM} f
,null content,fi.ITEMKEY,fi.ITEMVALUE,fi.OTHERVALUE FROM ${FORM} f left join ${FORMITEM} fi on fi.FORMID=f.FORMID
where f.encId=#encId# and f.formType=#formType# and f.formModel=#formModel#
and f.CreateTime>=#beginDate# and f.CreateTime<=#endDate# and f.formID=#formId#
order by f.EvaluationTime DESC ${WITHUR}

select f.*,fi.ITEMKEY,fi.ITEMVALUE,fi.OTHERVALUE from(SELECT f.formID,f.formVersionId, f.formType, f.formModel, f.encId, f.patientId, f.stationId, f.totalScore, f.EvaluationTime,f.CreateTime,f.createUserId,f.createUserName,null eventIds,null versionNo
,f.content as content
,null content
,f.states,row_number() OVER (ORDER BY f.EvaluationTime desc,f.CREATETIME desc) rowN FROM ${FORM} f where f.patientId=#patientId# and f.encId=#encId# and f.formType=#formType# ) f left join ${FORMITEM} fi on fi.FORMID=f.FORMID where f.rown=1
and fi.itemKey in
#itemKeys[]#
and fi.itemKey=#itemKey#
${WITHUR}

SELECT formID, formType, formModel, encId, patientId, stationId, totalScore, EvaluationTime, CreateTime, createUserId, createUserName, RECORD_POID, CONTENT, formItems, formVersionId, STATES, BEDID, receiveTime, receiveUserId, receiveUserName, CALM_ID, EVENTIDS FROM ${FORM} where encId=#encId# and
encId IN
#encIds[]#
AND
formType=#formType# and formModel=#formModel#
and CreateTime>=#beginDate# and CreateTime<=#endDate# and formID=#formId#
order by EvaluationTime desc,CreateTime desc ${WITHUR}

SELECT formID, formType, formModel, encId, patientId, stationId, totalScore, EvaluationTime, CreateTime, createUserId, createUserName, RECORD_POID, NULL CONTENT, formItems, formVersionId, STATES, BEDID, receiveTime, receiveUserId, receiveUserName, CALM_ID, EVENTIDS FROM ${FORM} where
ENCID IN
#encIds[]#
AND
formType IN
#formTypes[]#
order by EvaluationTime asc ${WITHUR}

SELECT formID, formType, formModel, encId, patientId, stationId, totalScore, EvaluationTime, CreateTime, createUserId, createUserName, RECORD_POID, CONTENT, formItems, formVersionId, STATES, BEDID, receiveTime, receiveUserId, receiveUserName, CALM_ID, EVENTIDS FROM ${FORM} where EvaluationTime>=#beginDate# and EvaluationTime<#endDate# and formModel=#formModel#
and stationId IN
#stationId[]#
and totalScore>#gtTotalScore# and totalScore<#ltTotalScore# ${WITHUR}

SELECT formID, itemKey, itemValue, otherValue FROM ${FORMITEM} where formID in( SELECT formID FROM ${FORM} where encId=#encId# and
encId IN
#encIds[]#
AND
formType=#formType# and formModel=#formModel#
and formID=#formId#
) ${WITHUR}
SELECT formID, formType, formModel, encId, patientId, stationId, totalScore, EvaluationTime, CreateTime ,createUserId,createUserName FROM ${FORM} where formID=#value# ${WITHUR}

select encId from ${FORM} where stationId=#stationid# and encid IN
#encid[]#
and formModel IN
#formModel[]#
AND EvaluationTime>=#inStationDate#
group by encid ${WITHUR}

select encId from ${FORM} where stationId=#stationid# and encid IN
#encid[]#
and formModel IN
#formModel[]#
AND EvaluationTime>=to_date(#inStationDate#, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
group by encid ${WITHUR}

SELECT formID, formType, formModel, encId, patientId, stationId, totalScore, EvaluationTime, CreateTime, createUserId, createUserName, RECORD_POID, NULL CONTENT, formItems, formVersionId, STATES, BEDID, receiveTime, receiveUserId, receiveUserName, CALM_ID, EVENTIDS FROM ${FORM} where formType=#formType# and formModel=#formModel#
and encId=#encId#
and encId IN
#encIds[]#
and EvaluationTime>=#beginDate# and EvaluationTime<=#endDate# and formID=#formId#
order by EvaluationTime asc ${WITHUR}

SELECT formID, formType, formModel, encId, patientId, stationId, totalScore, EvaluationTime, CreateTime, createUserId, createUserName, RECORD_POID, CONTENT, formItems, formVersionId, STATES, BEDID, receiveTime, receiveUserId, receiveUserName, CALM_ID, EVENTIDS from ${FORM} where formID=#value# ${WITHUR}

SELECT formID, itemKey, itemValue, otherValue FROM ${FORMITEM} where encId=#encId# and formID=#formId# AND itemKey IN('admIdentity','adm65Identity','admWeightBMIScore','adm65WeightBMIScore') ${WITHUR}
SELECT CONTENT from ${FORM} where patientId=#patientId# and formType=#formType# and formModel=#formModel# and formVersionId=#formVersionId# order by EvaluationTime desc,CreateTime desc ${WITHUR}
SELECT formId from ${FORM} where patientId=#patientId# and formType=#formType# and formModel=#formModel# and formVersionId=#formVersionId# order by EvaluationTime desc,CreateTime desc ${WITHUR}
sqlMap.delete: delete from ${FORM} where formType = #formType# and patientId=#patientid# and encId=#encid# and EVALUATIONTIME = #evaluationTime#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT f.FORMID ,f.FORMTYPE ,f.FORMMODEL,f.ENCID,f.PATIENTID ,f.STATIONID ,f.TOTALSCORE ,f.EVALUATIONTIME,f.CREATETIME,f.CREATEUSERID ,f.CREATEUSERNAME ,f.RECORD_POID,f.CONTENT, f.FORMITEMS ,f.FORMVERSIONID ,f.STATES,f.BEDID,f.CALM_ID,f.receiveTime,f.receiveUserId,f.receiveUserName,f.eventIds FROM ${CALM} c left join ${FORM} f on f.CALM_ID=c.CALM_ID where f.PATIENTID=#patientId# and f.ENCID=#encId#
and f.ENCID IN
#encIds[]#
order by f.EVALUATIONTIME asc ${WITHUR}
select count(*) from ${FORM} where formType=#fromType# and ENCID=#encId# and PATIENTID=#patientId# and STATES='Y' ${WITHUR}
